Piratini, December 14, 1838.

Unable to properly perform the functions of the State Secretariats entrusted to me, I resign and beseech Your Most Excellent Excellency,

May God keep Your Excellency.  
Piratini, December 14, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir José da Silva Brandão  
Minister and Secretary of War, Navy, and Foreign Affairs.  
Domingos José de Almeida
